content:
Faust family

1 Gerson FAUST
 + Hanna                             c1750 - 1830 #349
  2x Aron FAUST                      1774-82
    + Rachel                         1784-91 - 1839 #100 (Majer)

     3o Perla FAUST                  Mar 25, 1806 Krakow - Oct 28, 1882 #401

             married Jun 7, 1825 #25

             + Dorothea WITTLIN      Jul 28, 1893 Lwow
